EmailTemplate.name: SGN_BRD_16_TGL_EVNT_Single Cask Kinrossie Launch.Email - invitation eDM.Invitati
EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation: Launch of The Glenlivet Single Cask – 7 April
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Glenlivet Guardian,
You are cordially invited to be part of our unveiling of The Glenlivet Single Cask.
Join us as we celebrate the brand’s heritage and dedication to quality.
Click on the link <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/SGN_TGL-Single-Cask-Kinrossie-Launch_Page---Registration.html]]> and RSVP your details.
<[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/SGN_TGL-Single-Cask-Kinrossie-Launch_Page---Registration.html]]> If you no longer wish to receive these emails you may unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> at any time.
